entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
